text: Hey Craig, I don't know where to start. This is a creature reel with some animation I did. I made all the rigs except for the tigers. It's not strong enough to get a job though. <https://vimeo.com/336363284>

attachments.title: Creature Reel 2018
attachments.text: My creature reel with some of my own models/rigs. The only model/Rig I didn't create is the Tiger by CG spectrum.
attachments.video_html: <iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/336363284?autoplay=1&app_id=122963" width="400" height="225" frameborder="0" title="Creature Reel 2018" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>
